mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTPRICE, STOCKQUANTITY, REGISTRATIONDATE, ENVMARK, THUMBNAIL, DETAILIMAGE, CATEGORYNUMBER, DISCOUNTCODE) VALUES (#{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{stockQuantity}, #{registrationDate}, #{envMark}, #{thumbnail}, #{detailImage}, #{categoryNumber}, #{discountCode});
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCTNAME = #{productName}, PRODUCTPRICE = #{productPrice}, STOCKQUANTITY = #{stockQuantity}, REGISTRATIONDATE = #{registrationDate}, ENVMARK = #{envMark}, THUMBNAIL = #{thumbnail}, DETAILIMAGE = #{detailImage}, CATEGORYNUMBER = #{categoryNumber}, DISCOUNTCODE = #{discountCode} WHERE PRODUCTCODE = #{productCode};
